caption.p: Global peatland distribution and estimated annual actual emissions from peatland degradation. Data are calculated by correcting the potential emissions in Fig. 1 for the share of degraded peatland (see Supplementary Fig. 1), thereby highlighting regions with a large degree of disturbance. The map shows the average emission per area peatland for any given land use and climate category, not the average emission per area of disturbed peatland
